description:
Reno and Tenma are #1 on the "Ranking of Upcoming Idols". Urara goes wild when the two of them make a sudden appearance at Wonder Hill in Kanazawa. While Urara gives it her all in a fight with the idol she likes, her opponent Reno seems to be troubled about something.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Idol nano de Vanguard wa Kinshi Desu
アイドルなのでヴァンガードは禁止です
